aspiration:VileToxins.NAME: Vile Toxins
aspiration:VileToxins.FLAVOR: A mix so vile, it even makes organic and inorganic beings alike recoil in horror.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yPoison to an enemy that wasn't poisoned, apply #b

aspiration:RingOfOuroboros.NAME: Ring of Ouroboros
aspiration:RingOfOuroboros.FLAVOR: Your ring suddenly came alive and started eating itself. Prodding it, hurts you as much as it helps you focus.

aspiration:InfernalBlood.NAME: Infernal Blood
aspiration:InfernalBlood.FLAVOR: Your thirst for destruction has turned your blood into something wholely more sinister.
